title: ‘Better now than in October’: Human Powered Health riders, staff scramble to find new jobs
content:
The long-running men's team will fold at the end of the season, and management is doing all it can to find new gigs for all: 'It was a surprise for everyone.'

Read the full article at ‘Better now than in October’: Human Powered Health riders, staff scramble to find new jobs on Velo.
author: ahood
